numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The overall percentage of players of color is much higher than the overall percentage of head coaches of color.
2. These variables do not seem to be directly correlated.
3. Major League Soccer has 60% players of color.
4. Major League Soccer has 41% lead coaches of color.
5. It is hard to give the title "most diverse league".
6. It is easy to give the title "least diverse league".
7. MLB has 40% players of color.
8. MLB has 20% lead coaches of color.
9. In my opinion, MLB is the least diverse league.
10. Even in MLB, there is a clear gap between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of lead coaches of color.
11. I wonder why Major League Soccer is one of the least diverse leagues for players of color.
12. I wonder why Major League Soccer is the most diverse league for head coaches of color.
13. I come from a state.
14. This state is one of the least diverse states in the country.
15. Racial bias exists in my community.
16. Many people in my community can ignore racial bias.
17. If racial bias does not affect a person personally then it is easy for this person to ignore racial bias.
18. I am a person of color.
19. I have seen this ignoring happen.
20. This is frustrating.
21. I think that it is important that people are aware of racial injustice.
22. I think that it is especially important that people in less diverse communities are aware of racial injustice.
23. The main idea of this display is to show a large gap between the percentage of players of color and the percentage of lead coaches of color.
24. One potential headline is: When it comes to team leadership, are we telling people of color to sit on the sidelines?
